name: Sun Life Financial Inc. Class A Non-Cumulative Preferred Shares Series 3
longDescription: Sun Life Financial is one of Canada's Big Three life insurance companies along with Great-West Lifeco and Manulife. Sun Life provides insurance, retirement, and wealth-management services to individual and corporate customers in Canada, the United States, and Asia. It also owns MFS Investment Management, a Boston-based asset-management firm. Sun Life generates about a third of its profit from asset-management operations.

fullAddress: 1 York Street,31st Floor, Toronto, ON, CA
